snippet: Gov. Rick Snyder of Michigan declared a state of emergency for the Flint area as concerns grew about the health effects of lead-tainted water there.
abstract: Michigan Gov Rick Snyder declares state of emergency for city of Flint, citing growing health concerns over lead-contaminated drinking water that was pumped from Flint River.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Snyder of Michigan declared a state of emergency for the Flint area as concerns grew about the health effects of lead-tainted water there.

headline.main: Michigan: Emergency Declared Over Flint’s Water
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Emergency Declared Over Flint’s Water
